name: Chrome Division
description: '''Chrome Division''' is a Norwegian [[Rock music|rock]] band formed in 2004. The current lineup consists of founding member [[Shagrath]] (also of [[Dimmu Borgir]]) on rhythm guitar, along with Eddie Guz as the vocalist, Mr Damage on lead guitar and Tony White on drums. The band has released five albums through [[Nuclear Blast]]: ''[[Doomsday Rock 'n Roll]]'' in 2006, ''[[Booze, Broads and Beelzebub]]'' in 2008, ''3rd Round Knockout'' in 2011, ''Infernal Rock Eternal'' in 2014, and ''One Last Ride'' in 2018. The band announced that their fifth album would be their last.
